item.title: About Me
item.description: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand. Martin Fowler, 2008. About MetalBlueberry I’m a passionate developer moving toward the specialization in IoT and Big Data technologies. I feel comfortable working with Python and Go, and I have no problem understanding other programming languages. I know how to use Docker and most of the time, I deploy applications inside docker containers.

item.title: About Me - The long story
item.description: About MetalBlueberry I’m a programmer since I discovered that things could be automated. Attention You are about to read my life since I remember it, focused on how I became a professional developer. The beginning I started with Win-logo in the school by drawing some figures with simple functions. I still remember what could be one of the firsts functions I’ve ever wrote. tits(size) The objective is clear, draw two tangent circles of the desired size.
